description:
In a twist, Neon and Miki challenge Tokiya and Recca to a doubles match. But will the two be able to work past their differences to win, or will Neon sing their swan song?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijo no Yuuwaku Shi no Nijuusou!!
Seduction of the Beauties: Double-Play of Death!!
美女の誘惑 死の二重奏!!
